text:
[Verse]
Feeling the beat drop
In the summer haze
We ain’t got no map
Just following the craze

[Verse 2]
Lightning in the sky
Music in our veins
Feet hitting the pavement
Like we got no chains

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feeling no pain
Hearts on fire
We’re never gonna tire

[Verse 3]
Splash in every puddle
Laugh through the storm
Every drop a treasure
We’re breaking every norm

[Verse 4]
Night turns into day
Rhythm never stops
The world’s our stage
Under those raindrops

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feeling no pain
Hearts on fire
We’re never gonna tire
title: Dancing In The Rain
